Home Row Practice.description: Practice the home row keys: type asdf jkl;
Type in this order: f d s a l k j ;

Typing Simple Sentences.description: Type this sentence exactly: The cat runs fast.
Type this sentence: I like to read books.

Typing Short Paragraphs.description:
Type the paragraph exactly:

My name is John. I like school. I play football every day.
Typing Short Paragraphs.expected: My name is John. I like school. I play football every day.

Typing Short Paragraphs.description:
Type the paragraph:

I have a pet dog. It is very friendly. I take care of it.
Typing Short Paragraphs.expected: I have a pet dog. It is very friendly. I take care of it.

Typing Sentences.description: Type this sentence: Learning is fun when we practice daily.
Typing Sentences.expected: Learning is fun when we practice daily.

Typing Sentences.description: Type this sentence: My favourite subject is Mathematics.

Typing Short Paragraphs.description: Type the paragraph: I enjoy reading stories about animals. It helps me learn new things.
Typing Short Paragraphs.expected: I enjoy reading stories about animals. It helps me learn new things.

Typing Short Paragraphs.description: Type the paragraph: The sun rises in the east and sets in the west.
Typing Short Paragraphs.expected: The sun rises in the east and sets in the west.

Typing Paragraphs.description: Type the paragraph: I went to the park today. The flowers were beautiful and the birds were singing.
Typing Paragraphs.expected: I went to the park today. The flowers were beautiful and the birds were singing.

Typing Paragraphs.description: Type the paragraph: My family and I had a picnic by the river. We played games and ate delicious food.
Typing Paragraphs.expected: My family and I had a picnic by the river. We played games and ate delicious food.

Typing Medium Paragraphs.description: Type the paragraph: Education is important for a bright future. Students should study hard and practice daily.
Typing Medium Paragraphs.expected: Education is important for a bright future. Students should study hard and practice daily.

Typing Medium Paragraphs.description: Type the paragraph: Good habits help us grow into responsible and kind individuals.
Typing Medium Paragraphs.expected: Good habits help us grow into responsible and kind individuals.

Typing Essays.description: Type the essay: My favourite hobby is reading books. I enjoy learning new words and exploring different stories. Reading improves my imagination and writing skills.
Typing Essays.expected: My favourite hobby is reading books. I enjoy learning new words and exploring different stories. Reading improves my imagination and writing skills.

Typing Reports.description: Type the report: The school organized a science fair. Students presented projects about plants, animals, and technology. The event was informative and fun.
Typing Reports.expected: The school organized a science fair. Students presented projects about plants, animals, and technology. The event was informative and fun.

Typing Research Papers.description: Type the research paper: Climate change affects weather patterns worldwide. Governments and citizens must take action to reduce carbon emissions and protect the environment.
Typing Research Papers.expected: Climate change affects weather patterns worldwide. Governments and citizens must take action to reduce carbon emissions and protect the environment.

Typing Theses.description: Type the thesis excerpt: Renewable energy sources like solar and wind power are crucial for sustainable development. Research shows they can significantly reduce greenhouse gas emissions.
Typing Theses.expected: Renewable energy sources like solar and wind power are crucial for sustainable development. Research shows they can significantly reduce greenhouse gas emissions.

Typing Dissertations.description: Type the dissertation excerpt: Advanced artificial intelligence applications in healthcare improve diagnostics, treatment planning, and patient monitoring. Ethical considerations are paramount.
Typing Dissertations.expected: Advanced artificial intelligence applications in healthcare improve diagnostics, treatment planning, and patient monitoring. Ethical considerations are paramount.

Typing Dissertations.description: Type the dissertation excerpt: Sustainable urban planning reduces pollution, enhances quality of life, and supports economic growth. Collaborative efforts between governments and communities are essential.
Typing Dissertations.expected: Sustainable urban planning reduces pollution, enhances quality of life, and supports economic growth. Collaborative efforts between governments and communities are essential.
